pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, April 16, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

 Kitchener, Ontario  

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will tour the Communitech startup space, and make an innovation and technology jobs announcement. A media availability will follow. Leader of the Government in the House of Commons Bardish Chagger will be in attendance.

Communitech
The Tannery, #100
51 Charles Street West

Notes for media:  

  • Pooled photo opportunity of tour
  • Open coverage of announcement and media availability
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 10:15 a.m.

Cambridge, Ontario  

7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a town hall Q&A.

St. Benedict Catholic Secondary School
50 Saginaw Parkway         

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media requiring parking for satellite trucks should contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
  • Media requiring advance set-up will have site access as of 5:00 p.m. All media should arrive no later than 6:30 p.m.
